in every industry. They define the best practices of your
company
and distinguish you from •your competitors.
Cloud computing makes a

new class of applications possible. To help you get the most from these process-aware applications, Salesforce.Com Offers the Visual Process Manager. This intelligent design tool lets you visually draw
process flows or decision
trees, and automatically builds these processes into your business apps for you. You can then
run your apps
in the cloud instantly.
Make every app more intelligent
Now your

can proactively guide users through multi-step procedures and intelligently recommend next steps. Your apps do the work for you by enforcing business rules, identifying opportunities, and minimizing manual tasks. The results are higher customer satisfaction, improved organizational performance, and lower operating costs.
Streamline your customer service
Automating processes such as call scripting, issue resolution, and up-sell/cross-sell identification dramatically improves call times, first-call resolution, and call costs. Call center
. Ch
eck point
managers can define scripts that lead call center agents or customers to the right decision, whether they’re on the phone or using Web self-service.
Focus your sales team
Sales teams spend a lot of time on administrative tasks like filling out lengthy order forms or putting together complex proposals.
Automate your entire company with custom process apps

The demand for process automation extends beyond sales and customer service. From employee on-boarding in HR to contract management in legal, the Visual Process Manager allows rapid application development in every department.
Design your processes and deploy them in the cloud

Applications typically begin with someone drawing out the business process. The process then gets hard-coded into the application and can’t be easily changed as the business grows and adapts to the marketplace.
Build processes in 4 easy steps
The Visual Process Manager makes building business processes intuitive and easy.
Step 1: Visual process designer

– Design your business processes easily with an intuitive user interface. Draw from a library of process tools, including presentation components (forms, questions, choices, and more) and logic components (task assignments, decision trees, and approval processes). Add components to a visual process design diagram through simple drag-and-drop actions.
Step 2: Process simulator
– Optimize your process design by simulating complex processes before deploying them. Identify bottlenecks and conflicts quickly, and iterate the process as needed.
Step 3: Wizard builder
– Build intelligent wizards into the user interface of your applications with no programming. Wizards can guide people through a process by deciding which pages to display next based on user input.
Step 4: Real-time process engine

– As soon as your app is ready, deploy it to the cloud with just two clicks. The real-time process engine automatically scales to fit the needs of any size company. The run-time engine ensures the process is run consistently without fail, including all security measures, process decisions, callouts, and automated actions.
Force.com Free Edition
– Build and run your first cloud app for up to 100 users FREE. Choose Force.com Free Edition if you’d like to try building one app on the leading cloud platform.
Change your processes to reflect changing markets

The Visual Process Manager lets companies rapidly automate business processes. Companies like yours can use the speed and power of cloud computing to visually design processes without code or infrastructure and deploy them to the cloud—instantly.
The Visual Process Manager is based on technology acquired from Informavores. For more information, contact your sales representative.
